items.sentence: Tom is always up-to-date with the latest news.
Tom is going to have to live with what he did.
Going for a walk with you would make me happy.
Have there been many outbreaks of the measles?
Have you already decided on your thesis topic?
Have you already spent the money Tom gave you?
Have you always wanted to be a police officer?
When did you start making money playing music?
When she entered the room, he got to his feet.
When she was thirteen, she ran away from home.
